details.arabic_diacless: أستودع اللٰه دينك، وأمانتك، وخواتيم عملك
details.arabic: أَسْتَوْدِعُ اللّٰهَ دِيْنَكَ، وَأَمَانَتَكَ، وَخَوَاتِيْمَ عَمَلِكَ
details.translations: I leave your religion in the care of Allah, as well as your safety, and the last of your deeds.
details.reference: Ahmad 2/7, At-Tirmithi 5/499. See also Al-Albani, Sahih At-Tirmithi 2/155.

pageTitle: Dua of the resident for the traveller #1
